EnumProperty.Name: SourceLanguage
EnumProperty.Description: Specify the language of the source strings for new files. -source-language <language>[_<region>]

EnumProperty.Name: TargetLanguage
EnumProperty.Description: Specify the language of the translations for new files. -target-language <language>[_<region>]

BoolProperty.Name: NoObsolete
BoolProperty.Description: Drop all obsolete and vanished strings. -no-obsolete

BoolProperty.Name: UpdateSilent
BoolProperty.Description: Do not explain what is being done. -silent

BoolProperty.Name: NoSort
BoolProperty.Description: Do not sort contexts in TS files. -no-sort

EnumProperty.Name: Locations
EnumProperty.Description: Specify/override how source code references are saved in TS files. Default is absolute for new files. -locations {absolute|relative|none}

BoolProperty.Name: NoUiLines
BoolProperty.Description: Do not record line numbers in references to UI files. -no-ui-lines

BoolProperty.Name: DisableSameTextHeuristic
BoolProperty.Description: Disable the named merge heuristic. Can be specified multiple times. -disable-heuristic sametext

BoolProperty.Name: DisableSimilarTextHeuristic
BoolProperty.Description: Disable the named merge heuristic. Can be specified multiple times. -disable-heuristic similartext

BoolProperty.Name: DisableNumberHeuristic
BoolProperty.Description: Disable the named merge heuristic. Can be specified multiple times. -disable-heuristic number

StringListProperty.Name: IncludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Additional locations to look for include files. -I <includepath>

StringListProperty.Name: FunctionAliases
StringListProperty.Description: With +=, recognize <alias> as an alternative spelling of <function>. With =, recognize <alias> as the only spelling of <function>. -tr-function-alias <function>{+=,=}<alias>[,<function>{+=,=}<alias>]...

StringProperty.Name: QmOutputDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path of the generated QM output directory.

StringProperty.Name: QmOutputFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the name of the generated QM output file.

BoolProperty.Name: IdBased
BoolProperty.Description: Use IDs instead of source strings for message keying -idbased

BoolProperty.Name: RemoveIdentical
BoolProperty.Description: If the translated text is the same as the source text, do not include the message -removeidentical

StringProperty.Name: Project
StringProperty.Description: Name of a file containing the project's description in JSON format. Such a file may be generated from a .pro file using the lprodump tool. -project <filename>

StringProperty.Name: UntranslatedPrefix
StringProperty.Description: If a message has no real translation, use the source text prefixed with the given string instead -markuntranslated <prefix>

BoolProperty.Name: ReleaseSilent
BoolProperty.Description: Do not explain what is being done -silent
